entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a teacher at Hogwarts who is shouting at Harry Potter. He mentions that Harry's father would never attack him unless it was four on one.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is being shouted at by Snape and is trying to cast spells but they are being blocked by Snape.

entities.name: death eater
entities.description: A huge Death Eater is behind Harry.

entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as a place that will turn up soon.

relationships.description: Potter is being shouted at by Snape.
A huge Death Eater is behind Potter.
Snape is concerned that the Ministry will turn up soon.
